content: this is a pattern for a 3d bag charm in the shape of the melt the ice hat the finished product measures about 7x7cm 2 5x2 5in circa weights about 9g total less than 1/2oz and has a loop on top to be attached where you please it is easily customiseable with different yarn weights and crochet hook sizes the combo i used will ensure a dense and sturdy fabric that will withstand being exposed to the elements if you can please use the leftover yarn from your melt the ice hat additionally you will need scissors yarn needle stitch markers
